scripts.dev-docker: cd infrastructure && docker compose -f docker-compose-local.yml --env-file ../.env up -d --force-recreate
scripts.stop-docker: cd infrastructure && docker compose -f docker-compose-local.yml stop
scripts.remove-docker: cd infrastructure && docker compose -f docker-compose-local.yml down
scripts.init-mongo: docker run --name mongodb -d -p 27017:27017 -v mongodb_data:/data/db mongo && npm run dev
scripts.dev-mongo: docker start mongodb && npm run dev
scripts.remove-mongo: npm run stop-mongo && docker rm mongodb && docker volume rm mongodb_data
